abstract: A facility in Chengdu operated by Foxconn, one of the world’s biggest contract electronics manufacturers, had to be partially shut down.
snippet: A facility in Chengdu operated by Foxconn, one of the world’s biggest contract electronics manufacturers, had to be partially shut down.
lead_paragraph: SHANGHAI — An explosion that killed three workers and injured 15 others last week at a Chinese factory that supplies products to Apple was caused by combustible dust, according to a preliminary investigation by the local authorities.

headline.main: Explosion at Apple Supplier Caused by Dust, China Says
headline.print_headline: Explosion at Apple Supplier Caused by Dust, Chinese Officials Say
